title: 820 3787 A liquid damaged
message:
Hi,
I have 3787 board that had a coffee spill on the IO board, no signs of oxidation
It turns on but blocks at half boot and has blue vertical lines on the screen like you see in the pictures.
Still waiting for the Crest CP 500  so not ultrasound yet
Any suggestions where to start ?
Thanks
[ATTACH type="full" width="200px"]9355._xfImport[/ATTACH]

title: 820 3787 A liquid damaged
message: Crap under GPU VRAM or corrosion in that area.
